name: Spreadstorm
detailed_description:
Spreadstorm is a puzzle adventure game, where you gain control over the digital signal and find yourself in a strange world of nodes, lights and endless darkness. No tips, guides or clear goal and only the one way — forward. Step by step you will learn the rules of this world and will begin to understand what is going on and what you supposed to do.

Features


  • A game world consisting of interconnected levels with more than one way to walktrough.
  • Challenging puzzles, that require wide skillset: from pure logic to speed of decision-making and reaction.
  • Minimalist and atmospheric environment with elements of storytelling.
  • Responsive and intuitive controls (gamepad recommended).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/Windows 8 (latest Service Pack) / Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video Card Shader Model 3.0+, 1GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game controller or keyboard

  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
